price: Yε mma soro abͻfoͻ nnsiane, gyesε nokorε bi nti, na sε (soro abͻfoͻ ba wͻn hͻ a), εno deε wͻ nnya ahomegye berε.
arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā nunazzilu al-malāikata illā bil-ḥaqi wamā kānū idhan munẓarīna
